mapper.update: update spa_dir set title = #{title} where id = #{id};
mapper.select: select d.* from master_slaves r inner join spa_dir d on r.master_id = d.id and r.slave_id = #{slave_id};

with r as ( select id, title, thumbnail, creator_id as creator, created_at as created_time from spa_dir union all select id, title, thumbnail, creator_id as creator, created_at as created_time from spa_doc ) select r.* from r inner join master_slaves on master_slaves.slave_id = r.id and master_slaves.master_id = #{master_id};
select g.* from group_resource r inner join spa_group g on g.group_id = r.group_id and r.resource_id = #{resource_id};
